content:
Hi Folks, a few of us have been working on some concetps for how the limitations faced in the embedded world can be addressed via WASI. This has resulted in the following document. I'd like to open it up to a wider audence for discussion. Nothing in here is written in stone, and your input, views, and advice would all be greatly appreciated.

Big thank you to Thomas, Stephen, Marcin, Christof, Dan and Xin for contributing. I apologise if I've forgotten anyone. The discussion document can be found on GitHub here: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/sig-embedded/blob/main/ExploringOptions/Alternative_Solutions_(WASI_Wasm).md
